title: CD Projekt Red's Next Witcher Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.12.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk Cyberpunk 2077, the Witcher game that isn't The Witcher 4, and crunch at Naughty Dog.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:36 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:18 - CD Projekt Red’s Next Game Might Be Witcher but not Witcher 4
00:21:53 - Kotaku’s Compensating Reviewers with Time Off
00:34:18 - Good Guy Discord
00:36:06 - Ubisoft’s Up to Something
00:40:15 - LEGO + Mario
00:44:07 - Out today
00:48:46 -  Ads  
Reader mail   -
00:52:45 - “Is it time to move what would be hands on demos to streaming platforms?” - Tommyboy
01:00:53 - Required Reading: https://bit.ly/39M5ffw 
01:04:33 - “How do you morally reconcile playing these video games?” - Gondors Condor
01:11:25 - You‘re Wrong
01:13:32 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Tim
